text: geudeul-i geudeul-ui seong-yag-eul kkaetteu lim-eulo malmiam-a hananim-eun geudeul eul jeojuhayeossgo geudeul-ui ma-eum-eul geo chilge hayeossnola geudeul-eun malsseum-eul wi johago geudeul-ege gyesidoen jinsil-ui malsseum-eul mang-gaghago issnani neohuineun geudeul gaunde sosuleul je-oehagoneun modeun geos-i wijodoem-eul balgyeonhalila geuleona geudeul-eul yongseohago gwandaehalji ni hananim-eun salang-eul bepuneunjaleul salanghasim-ila
